full_summary:
# Aggregate Breakdown and Delivery - Nahanni National Park Reserve
***
## Solicitation #5P468-23-0292/A
***
### Tender Details:

* Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0292/A
* Related amendments: Amendment 6 with no further addenda issued as of [Date]
* Nomenclature: None
* Posting Date: January 18th, 2024
* Closing Date: February 1st, 2024, 16:00 hrs
* Expected Start Date: February 8th, 2024
* Expected End Date: March 15th, 2024

### Notice Type:
This is a competitive bid by open tender, soliciting responses from suppliers in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

### Description of Supplies or Services:
Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to demolish and deliver crushed gravel from a proven source to Nahanni Butte in the Dehcho Region of the Northwest Territories, Canada. The contractor must ensure provision of specific and agreed-upon benefits for Indigenous people and Indigenous businesses in the area.

### Evaluation Criteria:
The tender will be evaluated on the basis of a two-submission procedure, with highly qualified bids to be awarded the contract. More information on the procurement process can be found in the special instructions of the bidding document.

### Logistics:
* The maximum acceptable bid size is 15 MB.
* Bidders must submit their bids by email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca)
* All inquiries should be directed to the contracting authority

### Document Purchasing and Clarifications:
Solicitation documents, as well as any subsequent amendments, are available on the Canada Buy Service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

### Tender Notice:
Solicitation documents, including the statement of work, can be downloaded from [canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29782/sow_23-0292-en_0.pdf](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29782/sow_23-0292-en_0.pdf) or translated versions in French at: [canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29782/sow_23-
